AD_ChaseEnded_002.synopsis: Shots this phrase when the Chase is over

AD_LostChase.synopsis: We've just lost 'Chicken chase', a famous goblin sport. The spectator is disgusted with our performance.

AD_GameStarts.synopsis: This is the commentator for the Chicken Chase game. She's yelling out for the players to begin lining up for the game.

AD_ArrivedOnBench.synopsis: Chicken Chase commentator is impatiently waiting for you to take up your position to start the game.

AD_ShootingBarrel.synopsis: Goblin says this phrase before destroying an Oil Barrel to spill oil and slow down the player during the game of chasing che chicken.

AD_ChaseEnded_003.synopsis: Shots this phrase when the Chase is over

AD_DuringGame_Player003.synopsis: Shouts this phrases during the Chicken Chase game.

AD_DuringGame_Player002.synopsis: Shouts this phrases during the Chicken Chase game.

AD_ChickenKilled.synopsis: Chicken/owlbear that they were tormenting during the game is dead. It was a cruel game but the goblin loved it. The goblin was having fun and is bemoaning its death.

AD_Intro.synopsis: The Commentator tells one of the players not to over-chase the chicken. This occurs before the game begins.

AD_BarrelShotHit.synopsis: During the game of chasing this goblin sees another goblin destroying an oil barrel to hinder the player. This goblin comments with approval.

AD_DuringGame_Player001.synopsis: Shouts this phrases during the Chicken Chase game.

AD_StartChase.synopsis: The goblin commentator is commencing the chicken chase with a grand announcement.

AD_BarrelShotMiss.synopsis: During the game of chasing this goblin sees another goblin shootin an oil barrel (to hinder the player) and missing. This goblin comments with derision

AD_OwlbearDiscussion.synopsis: Three goblins are standing around a vicious beast they're planning to use in their game as substitute for a normal chicken. The players are wary, but the commentator is goading them.

AD_WatchingGame_001.synopsis: One of the fans shouts these phrases (both for the chicken and owlbear).

AD_Comments.synopsis: This character is commenting on the 'Chicken Chase' match (akin to a commentator at a soccer match). She's yelling out as things happen in the match. The 'ball' is either a chicken, or an owlbear.

AD_CommentatorIsWaitingAfterChase.synopsis: Commentator is waiting for a player after the game of Chasing a chicken has ended.

AD_ChaseEnded_001.synopsis: Shots this phrase when the Chase is over

AD_ChaseEnded_002_0.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChaseEnded_002_0.text: To be fair, that chicken played a blinder.
AD_ChaseEnded_002_0.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_002_1.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChaseEnded_002_1.text: Hah! Looks like it's chasin' you.
AD_ChaseEnded_002_1.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_002_2.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChaseEnded_002_2.text: Oi! Your friends can't just join in, ain't how it works!
AD_ChaseEnded_002_2.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_002_3.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChaseEnded_002_3.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_002_4.speaker: Brawler Rot
AD_ChaseEnded_002_4.text: Oof. Won't be bettin' against you next time.
AD_ChaseEnded_002_4.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_LostChase_0.speaker: Krolla
AD_LostChase_0.text: Bested by a bloody chicken. Disgrace.

AD_GameStarts_0.speaker: Krolla
AD_GameStarts_0.text: We're startin' a new game! Move your hides!
AD_GameStarts_0.context: NodeContext: Like a commentator at a football game. Calling out to start a new game. Excited.

AD_ArrivedOnBench_0.speaker: Krolla
AD_ArrivedOnBench_0.text: Go on, get in close to the beast! If 'e bites, just bite 'im back!
AD_ArrivedOnBench_0.context: NodeContext: Urging you stand beside a vicious monster, faux-innocently advising you on what to do if the beast gets angry

AD_ArrivedOnBench_2.speaker: Krolla
AD_ArrivedOnBench_2.text: What ya waitin' for? Shimmy onto the startin' mark, and let's get goin'!

AD_ChaseEnded_003_0.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_0.text: Hah, looks like the chaser's gettin' chased!
AD_ChaseEnded_003_0.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_1.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_1.text: Form was all over the place. Like you didn't even train.
AD_ChaseEnded_003_1.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_2.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_2.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_3.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_3.text: Form was all over the place. Like you didn't even train.
AD_ChaseEnded_003_3.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_4.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_4.text: Oi! One player only, you bloody cheat!
AD_ChaseEnded_003_4.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_5.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_5.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_003_6.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_ChaseEnded_003_6.text: Gods, you might be one o' the greats.
AD_ChaseEnded_003_6.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_DuringGame_Player003_0.speaker: Tracker Tak
AD_DuringGame_Player003_0.context: NodeContext: All of these are being yelled by a goblin as they play chicken chase. Think of it as a game of footie, with you roaring as you play.

AD_DuringGame_Player002_0.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_DuringGame_Player002_0.context: NodeContext: All of these are being yelled by a goblin as they play chicken chase. Think of it as a game of footie, with you roaring as you play.

AD_ChickenKilled_0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_ChickenKilled_0.text: Hah! Guess it was all beak and no bite.
AD_ChickenKilled_0.context: NodeContext: The player has killed an owlbear cub - a terrifying creature. The goblin was scared of it but is acting braver than he felt to save face,

AD_ChickenKilled_1.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_ChickenKilled_1.text: Awwww... you burst our chicken! Where we gonna get a new one?
AD_ChickenKilled_1.context: NodeContext: Chicken that they were tormenting is dead. It was a cruel game but the goblin loved it. Was having fun.

AD_Intro_0.speaker: Krolla
AD_Intro_0.text: Ready to get a game going - just need a contender, you clubfoot cowards!
AD_Intro_0.context: NodeContext: Frustrated, trying to harangue the surrounding drunkards into playing her game. Disgusted with them.

AD_Intro_1.speaker: Krolla
AD_Intro_1.text: What, none of you want to join the chase? Too chicken for the chicken?
AD_Intro_1.context: NodeContext: Yelling at the goblins who are busy partying, annoyed and sneering that none want to play her beautiful games.

AD_Intro_2.speaker: Krolla
AD_Intro_2.text: All the great chasers are dead. Runny Cob. Splitfoot. Tark the Toe-Nail. Legends.
AD_Intro_2.context: NodeContext: Sighing to herself, wistful and misty-eyed. Bemoaning that the greats of her favourite game are gone, with no one to replace them.

AD_Intro_3.speaker: Krolla
AD_Intro_3.text: All the great chasers are dead. Runny Cob. Splitfoot. Tark the Toe-Nail. Legends.
AD_Intro_3.context: NodeContext: Sighing to herself, wistful and misty-eyed. Bemoaning that the greats of her favourite game are gone, with no one to replace them.

AD_Intro_6.speaker: Krolla
AD_Intro_6.text: Oi! Leave it - or it'll be wrecked for the game!
AD_Intro_6.context: NodeContext: Yelling at another goblin who's chasing a chicken around, worried she'll tried it out before a game in which they use it as a ball. Annoyed and authorative.

AD_BarrelShotHit_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_BarrelShotHit_0.text: Heh, nice one! Hit the chaser next!

AD_DuringGame_Player001_0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_DuringGame_Player001_0.context: NodeContext: Yelled by a goblin taking part in the game - he's chasing a chicken.

AD_DuringGame_Player001_1.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_DuringGame_Player001_1.context: NodeContext: All of these are being yelled by a goblin as they play chicken chase. Think of it as a game of footie, with you roaring as you play.

AD_BarrelShotMiss_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_BarrelShotMiss_0.text: How d'you miss the barrel?! Ain't even movin'!
AD_BarrelShotMiss_0.context: NodeContext: Jeering at the goblin beside for missing an easy shot.

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_1.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_1.text: I don't fancy chasin' this thing. It looks right peeved.

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_2.speaker: Krolla
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_2.text: It's got a beak like any other chicken, don't it? Let's just bloody play.
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_2.context: NodeContext: Blunt, dismissive - trying to dismiss their fears

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_5.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_5.text: 'S got wings. Reckon it can fly?

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_0.text: Dragons is fat and they fly fine.

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_4.speaker: Warrior Sul
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_4.text: It's still just a babe. Don't feel right messing with it, is all.

AD_OwlbearDiscussion_6.speaker: Krolla
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_6.text: Oh, shut it. What kinda coward won't even chase a baby. We playin' or what?
AD_OwlbearDiscussion_6.context: NodeContext: Blunt, dismissive - trying to dismiss their fears

AD_WatchingGame_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_WatchingGame_001_0.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_Comments_0.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_0.context: NodeContext: Roaring at the player to catch the chicken.

AD_Comments_2.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_2.text: Don't let the bloody thing escape!
AD_Comments_2.context: NodeContext: Owlbeae has tried to run off the field. Annoyed but also scared of the beast. Yelling at the other players to direct it back to the field and to continue the match.

AD_Comments_4.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_4.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_Comments_5.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_5.text: Don't let the bloody thing escape!
AD_Comments_5.context: NodeContext: Chicken has tried to run off the field. Annoyed. Yelling at the other players to direct it back to the field and to continue the match.

AD_Comments_6.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_6.text: FORFEIT! You're meant the chase the chicken, not the other way round!
AD_Comments_6.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_Comments_7.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_7.text: Oi, FOUL! TOO MANY PLAYERS, STOP THE GAME!
AD_Comments_7.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_Comments_9.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_9.context: NodeContext: The 'players' have got the ball near the goal. Anticipation of a goal.

AD_Comments_10.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_10.context: NodeContext: Fear but also delight as the owlbear dodges and weaves out of everyone's grasp.

AD_Comments_11.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_11.context: NodeContext: Yelling to catch the owlbear. But secretly afraid of it.

AD_Comments_12.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_12.context: NodeContext: Hooting with laughter. The owlbear is dodging around the field, swiping at players.

AD_Comments_13.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_13.text: You killed the bloody ball you lunatic! Get over here!
AD_Comments_13.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_Comments_15.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_15.context: NodeContext: Yelling in delight as the chicken dodges and weaves on the field.

AD_Comments_16.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_16.context: NodeContext: The 'players' have got the ball near the goal. Anticipation of a goal.

AD_Comments_17.speaker: Krolla
AD_Comments_17.text: Are you drunk?! Chase the bloody thing!
AD_Comments_17.context: NodeContext: Yelling in delight as the chicken dodges and weaves on the field.

AD_ChaseEnded_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_ChaseEnded_001_0.text: Oi! Only one chaser at a time, them's the rules!
AD_ChaseEnded_001_0.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_001_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_ChaseEnded_001_1.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_001_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_ChaseEnded_001_2.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_001_3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_ChaseEnded_001_3.text: Eh, you did fine. Reckon the chicken lost on purpose.
AD_ChaseEnded_001_3.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

AD_ChaseEnded_001_4.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_ChaseEnded_001_4.text: You killed it, you stupid git!
AD_ChaseEnded_001_4.context: NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.
